name: Late For School (billsmugs)
description:
A short game for the Crows Bitsy Jam. Playable in English and Toki Pona (with the option of using the sitelen pona writing system for Toki Pona).

I'm only a beginner at Toki Pona, so please let me know if I've made any mistakes with the translation!

sona pi musi ni (toki pona):

musi lili tawa musi kulupu pi ilo musi Bitsy: waso pimeja [linja pi toki Inli]. sina ken musi e ni kepeken toki Inli anu toki pona. sina wile e toki pona la, sina ken kepeken sitelen Lasin anu sitelen pona.

mi sona lili taso e toki pona! sitelen mi li pakala anu jaki la, sina o pana pona e mi!

English: toki pona: toki pona kepeken sitelen pona:
